DOC.brief_summary: This is a drug-drug interaction study; the purpose of this study is to examine the pharmacokinetics (levels of drug in the blood) of SPD503 (guanfacine hydrochloride) and Concerta (methylphenidate HCl) when given alone, and in combination.
DOC.brief_title: A Drug Interaction Study of SPD503 and Concerta Administered Alone and In Combination in Normal Healthy Volunteers
DOC.criteria: Subjects must be normal healthy adult volunteers with no significant abnormalities in medical history, physical exam, vital signs or lab evaluations at the screening visit
